keyword: how many calories in a mini cucumber
title: How Many Calories in a Mini Cucumber?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in a mini cucumber, plus carbs, fiber, protein, fat, and full nutrition details per serving with easy tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in a Mini Cucumber?
assumptions: Raw, fresh mini cucumber, approximately 60g (4-5 inches long), skin on, no added seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety, freshness, and growing conditions. Check labels or apps for specifics when available.

quick_answer.text: A mini cucumber contains about 10 calories and provides hydration with a bit of fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Sliced with 1 tsp olive oil dressing

faqs.q: How many calories in a mini cucumber?
faqs.a: Approximately 10 calories for one 60g mini cucumber.
Yes, about 2.2g carbs per mini cucumber, mostly from natural sugars.

faqs.q: How much fiber in a mini cucumber?
What's the difference in calories between mini and regular cucumber?
faqs.a: A regular cucumber (150g) has about 23 calories; minis are smaller and lower.
